CustomField.description: For 'Buffer Window' agents, this sets the number of recent conversation turns to include in the history. Each turn consists of a complete user-assistant exchange including any tool calls. A blank value includes all history; a value of 0 includes no history.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only applies to Buffer Window agents. Enter the number of recent conversation turns to remember (leave blank for unlimited, 0 for none). Each turn represents a complete user-assistant exchange.
CustomField.label: History Turn Limit
